This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0415 defines the following codes:

name: DrgTransferType
title: drgTransferType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify a type of hospital receiving a transfer patient, which affects how a facility is reimbursed under diagnosis related group (DRGâ€™s), for example, exempt or non-exempt.  Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the DRG segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0415 (Transfer Type)
